title: Paysafecard turned off?
body: So i wanted to buy a Paysafe for Riot points and wanted to look how much I get. As I am watching there is no Paysafecard option anymore,will it come back and why is it turned off?

replies.body: We disabled PaySafecards earlier today as a precaution after we noticed a problem this afternoon with all Paysafecard transactions failing to complete properly.    Don't know yet how long it will be down for since we're still working to determine the root cause, but hoping to get it back as soon as possible!
hi, since its 10 hours later now do you have an update if i may ask?
Should be back up and running now!
